sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"加强，增强"之意。
means: enhance ： 侧重指增加价值，魅力或声望等使人或物具有超科寻常的吸引力。
heighten ： 通常指使某物的某种性质变得不同于一般的显著或突出。
intensify ： 指深化或强化某事或某物，尤指其特别之处。
aggravate ： 指加剧令人不快或困难的形势。

sentence.Network_en: Large paintings can enhance the feeling of space in small rooms.
sentence.Network_cn: 大型油画可以增加小房间的宽敞感。

sentence.Network_en: The forest will enhance the attractiveness of the region.
sentence.Network_cn: 这片森林会为该地区平添更多魅力。

sentence.Network_en: This is an opportunity to enhance the reputation of the company.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是提高公司声誉的机会。

list.abs: 增强子(enhancer)指增加同它连锁的基因转录频率的DNA序列。增强子是通过启动子来增加转录的。
进出口专业英语词汇(E3)|商贸常用英语词汇 ... enhancement transistor 增强型晶体管 enhancer 增强器 Enicar 英纳格牌手表.
图文其中包括了优化和处理两大类。  优化(enhancing):是指传统的、被人们广泛接受的使珠宝玉石潜在的美显示出来的优化处理方法。有关优化方法包括:热处理、漂白、浸蜡.

俞敏洪托福单词11 - 红红的日志 - 网易博客 ... Enhance 提高，增强 Enhanced （增强的，提高的） Enthusiasm 热情，积极性.
剥除活动资产应作为既有资产之增添或增益(enhancement),并依其所属既有资产之性质归类为有形或无形资产。见解在制定IFRIC 20时,IFRIC意识到生产剥除成本之处理.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (formerly also as inhance): from Anglo-Norman French enhauncer, based on Latin in- (expressing intensive force) + altus 'high'. The word originally meant 'elevate' (literally and figuratively), later 'exaggerate, make appear greater', also 'raise the value or price of something'. Current senses date from the early 16th cent

entry.tran: 提高，增进，增加（价值、质量、吸引力等）
entry.def: To enhance something means to improve its value, quality, or attractiveness.

example.ex: They'll be keen to enhance their reputation abroad...
example.tran: 他们会非常渴望提高他们在国外的声誉。

example.ex: The superb sets are enhanced by Bobby Crossman's marvellous costumes.
example.tran: 博比·克罗斯曼绝妙的服装为华丽的舞台增色不少。

sentences.sentence: "This sauce will enhance the flavor of the meat"

auth_sentence.content: Drugs are one of many things that enhance performance.
auth_sentence.res_content: Drugs are one of many things that enhance performance.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Drugs are one of many things that enhance performance.

auth_sentence.content: Maintain and enhance knowledge of compliance and regulatory guidelines.
auth_sentence.res_content: Maintain and enhance knowledge of compliance and regulatory guidelines.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Maintain and enhance knowledge of compliance and regulatory guidelines.

auth_sentence.content: The mangrove walkway...will enhance this area of the Gardens.
auth_sentence.res_content: The mangrove walkway...will enhance this area of the Gardens.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The mangrove walkway...will enhance this area of the Gardens.

stems_affixes.word_buile: high高→adj.&adv. 高的[地],高度地 n. 高处
high高+ly表副词→adv.高地, 非常
high高→adj.&adv. 高的[地],高度地 n. 高处
high高+land陆地→n.高地, 丘陵地带
high高+way路→n. 公路,大路;交通干线
en加强+han=high高+ce→v.提高, 增强 v.提高
hi=high高举手+jack男人名→v.劫持,拦路抢劫

Sentence.sentence: Japanese listeners sometimes closed their eyes to enhance concentration.
He thought it would help enhance Harvard's reputation.
What to do to enhance their position

means.word_mean: 提高, 增加, 加强

sentences.en: The growth of a city often enhances the value of land close to it.
sentences.cn: 城市的发展常常会提高其附近的地价。

sentences.en: Rarity enhances the worth of old coins.

means.word_mean: 用计算机增强(照片等)，用计算机提高 (照片等)的质量

sentences.en: The computer can enhance the quality of photographs transmitted from space.
sentences.cn: 计算机可增强从太空发回的照片的质量。

means.word_mean: (价值等)上升；(价格等)上涨；提高

sentences.cn: 我们的生活费用已上涨。

jushi.english: This will enhance our operation effectiveness.
jushi.chinese: 这会提高我们的工作效率。

jushi.english: Good secretarial skills should enhance your chances of getting a job.
jushi.chinese: 出色的秘书工作技能会增加你找工作的机会。

jushi.english: The growth of a city often enhances the value of land close to it.
jushi.chinese: 城市的发展常常会提高其附近的地价。
